resources.string: Welcome to RingyDingyDingy! You can make your phone ring (even if it\'s set on silent or vibrate only) at any time by sending a text message (\"RingyDingyDingy\", a space, then your activation code) to your phone. Anyone with your activation code can make your phone ring at any time, so make sure to reset it if you give it to anyone you don\'t trust.
Remote ring has been initiated by
Your new code must be between four and eight characters long.
Sorry, your code wasn\'t between four and eight characters. Please enter a code that is.
